ygData.subject: Re: Skeletons and our spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Any chance you hit them from long range?  If you cast at long ranges you dont get the success messages.  You do always get the failures however. well, with mes
ygData.messageBody:
Any chance you hit them from long range? If you cast at long ranges you
dont get the success messages. You do always get the failures however.
well, with mes it should be obvious if it worked or not!

-----Original Message-----
From: Tom Fiola [mailto:tmf@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 2:51 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Skeletons and our spells


From: Tom Fiola <tmf@...>

Hi,
I am an 8th level gnomish enchanter. Do our normal spells around this
level work on skeletons? The last few times I have engaged them, I have
cast things like Enfeeble and Mesmerize. The spells were not resisted,
but
there was no indication of a spell effect, as is normally stated when
these
spells take effect (e.g. 'Your target has been Mesmerized').

Does anyone know what this means? I think the spells may have worked,
but I
am not positive. Can anyone shed any light? Thank you.

Xinorfarin, Cazic-Thule
